Name: Z Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of blue cheese stuffed olives.
Review: Grainy vodka with dry, wine-like notes. The garnish makes the drink.
History: Discovered in 2004 at Les Zygomates, Boston, USA. Our Martini cocktail page details its evolution and other common variants.
Nutrition: One serving of Z Martini contains 224 calories
